description.value:
+10 to Fellowship Tests when interacting with agents of the Ecclesiarchy of the Calixis Sector Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Gold Etched Aquila flanked by Laurels

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for Defending the Personnel and Property of the Adeptus Ministorum

Effect: Special

Notes: -
